directions: Place potatoes in a large pot, and cover with water.  The water level should stand about 2 inches above potatoes.  Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer until very tender.
Remove soup from heat, and slowly stir in nondairy creamer.  Continue stirring until soup is creamy.
Mash slightly with a potato masher.  Season with salt and pepper.  Serve hot or cold.
title: Potato Soup VI
